attributes.action: Stop the DVLA selling our personal details
attributes.additional_details: DVLA  are selling all your personal details to any one that require it and you can not do anything about it we need to change the data protection law so it covers all your  personal information and stop the DVLA from  making millions of pounds from your details  they even charge all private parking  agencies £2,50 for your information  so they can send the fines to you  this  must  STOP
attributes.background: at the moment the only  agencies that do not fall into the data protection act  is the government and as the DVLA  is owned by them they can do what thy want we need to stop this
